monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster's Max Health and Mana are increased by 12% each.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Shield by 30% of the damage dealt to enemies by critical hits. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Aqua Blast
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Aqua Blast Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (water) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Assault Shield
skills.description: Shield by 30% of the damage dealt to enemies by critical hits. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Combo Shielding
skills.description: Upon using a Shield action, additionally Shield an ally with the lowest Shield by 50% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Counter Attack
skills.description: When getting attacked, hit the attacker for 1 x 200% Attack. Hit can't be dodged and has 20% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Base
skills.description: Increases Critical Chance by 15% while wearing no equipment that increases Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Break
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies Armor Break (Debuff).

skills.name: Deep Wounds
skills.description: Aura: Bleed damage on enemies is increased by 40%.

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Electric Surge
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies Shield all allies for 1 x (500 + 25% Defense + 25% Attack), 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Eternal Heart
skills.description: This Monster's Max Health and Mana are increased by 12% each.

skills.name: Explosive Blast
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Explosive Blast Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 220% physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Explosive Blast Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Fiery Stabs
skills.description: 4 x 35% (140%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Fiery Stabs Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (fire) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Frost Pierce
skills.description: 8 x 65% (520%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +75% every hit has a 15% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Full Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack targeting each ally to this Monster. Shield self for 4 x (150 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Full Protect Lvl 2
skills.description: Redirects the next attack targeting each ally to this Monster. Shield self for 5 x (175 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Full Protect Lvl 3
skills.description: Redirects the next attack targeting each ally to this Monster. Shield self for 6 x (200 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hunt
skills.description: Aura: Increases the Critical Chance of the whole party by 4%.

skills.name: Ice Spear Barrage
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spear Volley
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Ice Spear Volley Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Life Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Lightning Assault
skills.description: 2 x 90% (180%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Assault Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash
skills.description: 2 x 85% (170%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lightning Slash Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) physical damage (wind) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Lord of the Deep
skills.description: Aura: Critical Hits of Aquatic Monsters apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Preemptive Shield
skills.description: Aura: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 75% of this Monster's Defense value to the whole party.

skills.name: Scent of Blood
skills.description: Aura: Your Monsters deal 10% more damage when attacking an enemy with Bleed stacks.

skills.name: Shield Aura
skills.description: Aura: All Shield effects of Monsters in the party are increased by 10%.

skills.name: Splatter
skills.description: Aura: When an enemy is knocked out, spread half of their Bleed stacks to the remaining enemies. (rounded up)

skills.name: Supply
skills.description: Aura: Heal all Monsters in the party by 4% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Weakening Crush
skills.description: Every physical attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness.

skills.name: Wind Weakness
skills.description: Wind damage increased by 50%
